summary: The company shared insights at a European Parliament Public Hearing on May 13, advocating for procuring space services to enhance European sovereignty and announcing participation in the SmallSat Europe conference. [cite: 1, 2, 3, 4]

Isar Aerospace announces its sponsorship and participation in the SmallSat Europe conference in Amsterdam on May 27-28, with team members Stella Guillen, Andrea Jaime Albalat, and Sam Arne Whalley speaking on panels. [cite: 8]
